Container.Name: weechat
Container.Overview:
WeeChat is a free and open-source Internet Relay Chat client, which is designed to be light and fast.
Before Running: mkdir -p /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/config /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/data /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/cache && chmod 777 /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/config /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/data /mnt/user/appdata/weechat/cache
Access weechat using: docker attach weechat
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, donations are greatly appreciated!
Container.Description: WeeChat is a free and open-source Internet Relay Chat client, which is designed to be light and fast.
